title: Chicken Salt
source: Turkey and the Wolf - Mason Hereford & JJ Goode
categories: Turkey and the Wolf - Mason Hereford & JJ Goode
ingredients: ½cup granulated chicken bouillon (preferably Totole brand, see this page; optional but optimal)
¼cup kosher salt (Diamond Crystal or about half as much Morton)
directions: You want the chicken bouillon to be the texture of sand, so grind it up however you like (spice grinder, mortar and pestle, put it in a sealed bag and whack it). No biggie if it’s a little too coarse or too fine. Stir it together with the salt.
This stuff will last longer than your pantry.
